version_description: Get an edge with the VIP subscription! Fight with Sol and Jet, 2 new VIP exclusive characters!
New missions! Are you ready to fight the CEO?

* Several fighters have increased punch speeds
* You can now evolve fighters with smaller increments and lower costs
* Various bugfixes
Small bugfixes and added "To be continued" after mission 128 for clarity.

Small update to revert the Xmas icon.
Online multiplayer will now try to pick the closest server to reduce lag.

Happy Chinese New Year!

Play the Year Of The Dog event starting on February 14 until 19 and unlock the new character "Gui" and her special dog.

V1.2.3:

Happy Chinese New Year!

Play the Year Of The Dog event starting on February 14 until 19 and unlock the new character "Gui" and her special dog.

V1.2.4:
* Bug fixes
* New app icon
Soulja Boy has joined the roster of fighters!
Unlock Zoe & Poe in Lee's dream event starting April 12th!
Bonus stages added in world map!

* Several fighters have increased punch speeds
* You can now evolve fighters with smaller increments and lower costs
* Various bugfixes

* 38 missions with a new story line added
* new character URS added

Enjoy!

* 38 missions with a new story line added
* new character URS added
* NEW: Lucky Wheel

Enjoy!
Small bugfixes and added "To be continued" after mission 128 for clarity.
New missions! Are you ready to fight the CEO?
Get an edge with the VIP subscription! Fight with Sol and Jet, 2 new VIP exclusive characters!
Fixed bug where touch input would be offset after completing a mission
Fix bug that could mute the audio
Compatibility updates
Fixes screen issue when playing in landscape mode
Update for iOS14.5
